abstract: Oklahoma Atty Gen Scott Pruitt files request to delay two executions in November and one in December because of a lack of drugs and to provide more time to implement new lethal injection protocols.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Scott Pruitt has filed a request to delay two executions in November and one in December because of a lack of drugs and to provide more time to implement new lethal injection protocols, according to court documents obtained on Monday.

headline.main: Oklahoma: State Seeks to Delay 3 Executions
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: State Seeks to Delay 3 Executions
